title: 253: "They Get to Shoot Nazis... That's Fun!"
itunes:title: "They Get to Shoot Nazis... That's Fun!"
description: After reading a short Memorial Day mystery called Visiting Hours Mike speaks with Bill Whittle about the protocols of Arlington National Cemetery, the price of freedom, and the need for gratitude.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
